original_text:
Israel, put your hope in the Lord,
    for with the Lord is unfailing love
    and with him is full redemption.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 여호와를 바랄지어다 여호와께서는 인자하심과 풍성한 속량이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: Israel, put your hope in the Lord
for with the Lord is unfailing love
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주와 함께하신 사랑은 변하지 않기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and with him is full redemption
